tags: Doctor friendliness,Explanation of the health issue,
review:
Honestly,  we are very lucky to meet Dr Durga Vytla. She is so supportive, throughout the treatment she was very caring. Her expertise are too good in pregnancy related issues. I had a lot of troubles related to uterus.l and getting pregnant.  She has done a marvellous job and today we got the news that we are going to have twins. Hospital staff mainly madinaguda staff is very very cooperative and attentive. I never had even a single moment where I felt that no one cared about us, not even telephonically. I thank all of them with my whole heart.
Thank you

tags: Doctor friendliness,Explanation of the health issue,Treatment satisfaction,
review:
In 10 years of my marriage life we visited so many Hospitals and had IUI and IVF treatments, but No success, After that we visited Hegde Hospital in June 2021. Hegde was excellent at understanding the problems that we faced earlier. Dr Durga vytla Madam is very friendly and explained issues very clearly. Madam did a couple of tests and suggested the correct approach and medicare with which treatment we were comfortable. We choose IUI Treatment and started in the first week of July 2021. We conceived in our 1st IUI cycle. Now I am a third month pregnant. Thank you so much, madam. Dr Durga vytla Madam treating me very well.

Heartfelt Thanks to Dr DURGA VYTLA madam and Front Office Staff and Nurses. I can say that this Miyapur branch Hegde hospital has got the best people at their Hospitals

tags: Doctor friendliness,Explanation of the health issue,Treatment satisfaction,Value for money,
review: We have been visiting Hegde Fertility center Madinaguda for the past three months . My issues is very well diagnosed and treatment plan is very well established . We are very happy that I am conceived after 11 years of marriage. I have undergone IVF treatment at other hospitals previously for two times with out success. We got positive result at the first attempt at Hegde Fertility center Madinaguda. Thanks a million to Dr Durga garu for diagnosing our issue and explaining us all the possibilities and recommending me to go for long protocol treatment which has been successful. Thanks to the friendly front office staff and sister staff too for guiding and supporting us when ever we visited the hospital.

tags: Doctor friendliness,Explanation of the health issue,Treatment satisfaction,Wait time,
review:
Vandana Mam and Durga Mam have been very positive and supporting from the first day.  We have consulted many doctors and hospitals before Hedge hospital and no luck.  Finally my wife have been conceived using IVF in Hedge hospital in Madinaguda Branch.  This is our life changing moments with Hedge Hospital and many unforgettable memories. 

Madinaguda Staff have been very helpful and friendly towards us.  
Special thanks to Durga Mam and she is very friendly and positive towards us.

Thanks to Hedge for the continued support..

tags: Explanation of the health issue,Doctor friendliness,Treatment satisfaction,Value for money,Wait time,
review:
Me and my wife visited Dr Durga vytla gaaru 6 months ago regarding infertility treatment. MY friend suggested me to visit her.We are very happy that my wife got conceived last month.We are so indebted to Durga madam as we think her treatment was the main reason.She is very friendly and genourous towards patients that half of the problem gets solved by just talking to her.No costly treatments,un neccesary medications yet great results.Surely she is gem of a doctor for she empathizes her pateints before and after treatment. We also thank Hegde hospital and staff there as they were also very helpfull.
Thank you very much Durga Madam.

tags: None
review:
I went to the Hegde from past four months for pre pragnancy checkups, staff were so good they responding even in weekends.
I had severe stomach pain and consulted Durga vytla mam in an emergency situation during the weekend. She responded immediately and provided the medication. Her way of treatment, explanation of any issue was too good. You can consult her for any gynec problems.

Thank you so much mam for the quick response.

review: I met Dr Durga 6 months back.. she explained our problems very well.. She advised couple of tests and gave simple treatment. *** ***** ** ********* *** **** ******* ** *** ********** My wife is now 3 months pregnant. Thank you Durga mam and Hegde hospital staff..

tags: Doctor friendliness,Explanation of the health issue,Treatment satisfaction,Value for money,Wait time,
review: We would like to offer our heartfelt gratitude to Dr Durga Vytla. Right from the first day we visited her in July 2020, she was absolutely clear of her approach. it was made very clear to us as well. We were very much in sync with what to expect next. Nothing about the treatment was unclear or unexpected. Very happy with the transparent attitude which doctor had all the while. Hospital staff deserves a big applause as the steps to reach the doctor are very methodical and staff is always available to address the queries. very friendly. I actually felt for them as my friends. Big thanks goes to Andrology lab experts. Their efficiency in processing the sample made a big contribution in the success of our IUI right in first attempt. Overall anyone would be delighted to visit the Hegde fertility Miyapur branch. And conception is a miracle as the punch line of hospital says and this miracle happens at Hegde. Tons of thanks again to each and everyone.

tags: Doctor friendliness,Explanation of the health issue,Treatment satisfaction,Value for money,Wait time,
review: It was wonderful experience for me when I met Dr Durga Vytla madam after treatment from various places. She has given me a new ray of hope and due to her great support and utmost care I am now pregnant. Ma'am, Injection nursing staff Shara, Bhavani and all those whom name I don't know are very supportive. Ma'am listen to the patient very patiently and give best advice. Hospital is also very neat and clean. I strongly recommend Dr Durga Vytla madam and Hegde fertility for best fertility treatment.

tags: Doctor friendliness,Explanation of the health issue,Treatment satisfaction,Value for money,Wait time,
review:
Big Appreciation to Dr. Durga Vytla in Miyapur Hegde Hospitals.
She always explain things in details and her medication really helped us in having the pregnancy naturally in less than 4 months of consultation. We were tying earlier for more than 2 years and nothing worked out. 
Hegde was excellent in understanding the problem and suggesting the correct approach and Medicare.

Thank You Hegde and Heartfelt Thanks to Dr. DURGA VYTLA and Front Office Staff and Nurses as well. 
HEGDE HOSPITALS have got the best People at their Hospitals..

tags: Doctor friendliness,Explanation of the health issue,Treatment satisfaction,
review: I have thyroid and pcod from last 2 years and I didn’t conceived. When I came to know about Hegde fertility Mrs.Durga vytla mam in practo, I have taken appointment and went for consultation. In very first consultation she spoke very well and understand my problem. She suggested natural treatment and in 1month I conceived and now I am pregnant. Really I am very happy. Thanku Durga mam. The staff and doctors are very impressive and have lot of patience. Every women’s dream is to become mother and I think Hegde fertility will fulfill all women’s dreams....

tags: Wait time,
review:
It's been 4+ years for us to hear what we have hear today. Yes! We are Pregnant. I'm so happy to core. Thanks to Dr. Durga Vytla for continues support and at most care to make our very 1st IVF cycle a successful one.

We are glad that have came to HEGDE HOSPITAL. Staff members in Hegde Hospital took at most care during our stressful IVF journey & helped us every moment whenever needed. We also benifited from acupuncture sessions which is a added advantage and helpful factor for our pregnancy.

Once again, We Thank each and every one of you as a Hegde Hospital Team. You people are rocking and making millions of people's dream come true. Conception. A Miracle. A Science. You people are striving to make it happen. Thank you.
